name: Michelino
tagline: A firmware for Arduino based remote controlled robot vehicles.
body:
Michelino
=========

A firmware for my Arduino based remote controlled Robot vehicle. This project
is part of my Arduino tutorial series beginning
[here](http://blog.miguelgrinberg.com/post/building-an-arduino-robot-part-i-hardware-components).
